hero_description: Trade cryptocurrencies and fiat currencies directly with peers. Secure, fast, and transparent exchanges with escrow protection.
widget_please_connect: Please connect your wallet to start trading
wallet_modal_forgot_password_desc: Enter your email to reset password
wallet_modal_terms: By connecting, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
wallet_modal_password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
privacy_intro_text: Welcome to P2PExchange. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our platform and tell you about your privacy rights.
privacy_collection_text: We collect and process the following types of information:
privacy_transaction_data_desc: Trade history, payment methods, and transaction details
privacy_technical_data_desc: IP address, browser type, device information
privacy_usage_data_desc: How you use our platform and services
privacy_usage_text: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy_usage_1: To provide and maintain our trading services
privacy_usage_2: To process your transactions and manage your account
privacy_usage_3: To improve our platform and user experience
privacy_usage_4: To communicate with you about updates and security
privacy_usage_5: To detect and prevent fraud and security issues
privacy_security_text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:
privacy_security_2: Secure servers with regular security audits
privacy_security_5: Regular security training for our team
privacy_sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data only in these circumstances:
privacy_sharing_providers_desc: Third-party vendors who assist in our operations
privacy_sharing_legal_desc: When required by law or legal process
privacy_sharing_business_desc: In connection with merger, sale, or acquisition
privacy_sharing_consent_desc: When you explicitly agree to share information
privacy_rights_text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy_rights_access_desc: Request access to your personal data
privacy_rights_deletion_desc: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:
terms_acceptance_text: By accessing and using P2PExchange ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms_eligibility_text: To use our platform, you must:
terms_eligibility_1: Be at least 18 years of age or the age of majority in your jurisdiction
terms_eligibility_2: Have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts
terms_eligibility_3: Not be prohibited from using our services under applicable laws
terms_eligibility_4: Comply with all local laws regarding online trading
terms_account_text: When creating an account, you agree to:
terms_account_1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
terms_account_2: Maintain and promptly update your account information
terms_account_3: Keep your password secure and confidential
terms_account_4: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
terms_account_5: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
terms_services_text: Our platform provides peer-to-peer cryptocurrency trading services:
terms_services_p2p_desc: Direct trading between users with escrow protection
terms_services_prop_desc: Funded trading accounts for qualified traders
terms_responsibilities_text: As a user, you are responsible for:
terms_responsibilities_1: Conducting your own due diligence before trading
terms_responsibilities_2: Understanding the risks associated with cryptocurrency trading
terms_responsibilities_3: Complying with all applicable laws and regulations
terms_responsibilities_4: Paying any applicable taxes on your transactions
terms_prohibited_text: You may not use our platform to:
terms_prohibited_1: Engage in fraudulent or illegal activities
terms_prohibited_2: Manipulate prices or create false market activity
terms_prohibited_3: Use automated systems to trade without authorization
terms_prohibited_5: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
terms_prohibited_6: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
terms_contact_text: For questions about these terms, contact us:
cookie_what_text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our platform. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our services.
cookie_how_text: We use cookies for various purposes:
cookie_essential_desc: Required for the platform to function properly
cookie_performance_desc: Help us understand how visitors use our platform
cookie_targeting_desc: Used to deliver relevant content and advertisements
cookie_types_essential_text: These cookies are necessary for the platform to work:
cookie_session_desc: Keep you logged in during your visit
cookie_security_desc: Protect your account and prevent fraud
cookie_managing_text: You have control over cookies on your device through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect platform functionality.
cookie_contact_text: If you have questions about our use of cookies:
cookie_consent_title: We use cookies to enhance your experience.
cookie_consent_description: By continuing to use {appName}, you agree to our use of cookies. Learn more in our
